Name: Rocket Island
About the game: Rocket Island is a fun 3D educational video game set in an open world environment. Rocket Island provides a pleasant environment to learn about science, technology, sustainability, cooking, art, community participation, and mathematical thinking skills. Features 25 characters to learn from and work with to collect resources to launch the rocket to space! Player can work hard to become an astronaut! Visit educationthesedays.com to download over 145 lesson plans for kids aged 12-16. Featured Pedagogy includes situated learning, repeated use of artefacts, 40,000 words throughout gameplay (130 page book), developing strategic planning and mathematical thinking skills, and self-directed learning. Stay tuned for more updates and improvements! Music by Steven Harriton.
